author: @Gohoylol
text: If you are following this tutorial you might be confused because unlike this video ebay's stock price never got higher than $30 at the moment. (Well at least, I did :) Since EBAY's split took place on July 20, 2015(2376 for 1000 split), If stock price of EBAY was 23.76 on this video, It is shown 10 for now. and you could adjust like.. ax1.set_yticks([0, 10, 20, 30])
